Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, little more than average”

Reviews.Content: hotel fills basic traveller theres special extra location bit walking top tourist sites lot peaceful sultanahmet district stayed walls thin earplugs night kept clean nicely ac couldnt figure wifi bit weak unstable average breakfast staff friendly helpful time istanbul stay hotel hear friend mine booked hotel ill tell ok

Reviews.Title: “Nothing amazing”

Reviews.Content: found hotel pleasant special location base exploring town blue mosque aya sofia tokapi palace etc clean basic staff bit hitandmiss helpful informative breakfast spectacular real complains hotel wouldnt stay return istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Next year again!”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel brazil idea pics hmmm believe believe lol choice friend stayed 27 days recommend stayed 104 cleaned everyday nice lady hear singing aloud morning breakfast omg delicious bread dunno name miss lot yougurt perfect staff gotta love 104 yay

Reviews.Title: “very average hotel”
Reviews.Author: iannsa
Reviews.Content: hotel average fairly located near tram station minutes walk grand bazaar minutes tourist sites hagia sophia blue mosque topkapi palace mosque etc hotel clean neat separate lounge bedroom bed 2 bedside tables please beware taxi drivers insist charge meter walk wont experience outside hotel disappointed hotel staff didnt intervene suggested public transport didnt pay taxi drivers fixed rate istanbul beautiful visit worth trips

Reviews.Title: “if they give you room 112: run away screaming!”
Reviews.Author: xdxdVSxdxd
Reviews.Content: hotel nice lots details 112 little dark window internal stairs worst imaginable smell kitchen continuous noise electric motors air conditioners stops defeated closing window close window air conditioning noisy directly bed die extreme heat extreme cold change bad barin sleep istanbul

Reviews.Content: hotel kept location near grand russian quarter breakfast nice restaurant corner tram stop ferry station easily reachable disadvantage winter switch heating windows shut night noise hot time summer ac wireless computer hotel bring laptop slow
